item.description:
Lets enjoy some Brazilian food, drinks, and live music at the Midwest Grill (http://www.midwestgrillrestaurant.com/ma/cambridge/).

This restaurant specializes in Brazilian barbecue, "rodizio", where they bring an endless variety of meat on swords to your table. There are also other menu options, please view their website for the full menu, http://www.midwestgrillrestaurant.com/ma/cambridge/menu.html

On Fridays and Saturdays, a guitarist/singer typically perform samba and other Brazilian popular music.

For directions and location information, the restaurant is located in the Inman Square area. Street parking is available. If you are traveling by public transportation, there are a few buses that stop right in front of the restaurant. If you don't mind a little walk, the nearest subway stations are Central Square and Lechmere.  To best plan your public transit route, visit the MBTA website, http://www.mbta.com/rider_tools/ .

 

In order for this event to be successful, we will need to be organized and follow some rules.

  • Rule number 1 - Please show-up if you reserved "yes"

If you are a "maybe", please reserve "no" and say "maybe" in the notes field or simply say "maybe" in the comments field for the event. Reserving "yes" when you are a "maybe" is misleading and is taking a space from someone who is definitely attending.

  • Rule Number 2 - Be on time!

When we have a large group, please understand that it is not fair to ask those who have arrived early to wait for late comers.

Just to explain the reasons for these rules, it is not fair for the restaurant to hold empty seats and lose business for latecomers or no-shows.  Lateness and no-shows gives me and the Meetup groups a bad reputation which may affect our ability to make future reservations. As it is, Meetup groups already have a bad reputation at many establishments and some places will not even take Meetup reservations.  

If you are late, please understand that we can not wait for you and can not guarantee that you will be able to join the group.

  • Rule Number 3 - Please be financially prepared to pay for your meal including taxes and tip.

The only other expectations that I have is for people to have fun.

This should be an awesome event and I am really looking forward to meeting new and familiar faces.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Brazilian food, drinks, and live music at the Midwest Grill
